    • Method Detail

      • checkPassword

        public boolean checkPassword(java.lang.String email,
                             java.lang.String hashedPassword)
        Checks if hash of the entered password matches that of the database.
        Specified by:
        checkPassword in interface logIn
        Parameters:
        email - Target email is used to identify the admin.
        hashedPassword - Hashed password to be matched.
        Returns:
        true if hashed password matches.

      • checkExistenceEmail

        public boolean checkExistenceEmail(java.lang.String email)
        Check if email exists in the database.
        Specified by:
        checkExistenceEmail in interface logIn
        Parameters:
        email - Target email.
        Returns:
        true if email exists.

      • checkExistenceName

        public boolean checkExistenceName(java.lang.String name)
        Check if name of Admin exists in the database
        Parameters:
        name - Target name of Admin to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if name of Admin exists.

      • checkName

        public java.lang.String checkName(java.lang.String email)
        Gets name of Admin using email.
        Parameters:
        email - Email of target Admin.
        Returns:
        Name of Admin with target email and null if target is not found.

      • checkExistenceID

        public int checkExistenceID()
        Generates unique adminID that is greater than the greatest adminID in database by 1.
        Returns:
        Int of unique adminID.

      • getStaffID

        public int getStaffID(java.lang.String email)
        Gets adminID by email.
        Parameters:
        email - Target email
        Returns:
        adminID of target email and -1 if target is not found.

      • checkStaffID

        public boolean checkStaffID(int staffID)
        Checks if staffID already exists in the database.
        Parameters:
        staffID - staffID to be checked
        Returns:
        true if staffID exists.

      • logIn

        public int logIn()
        Log in function for Admins. Prompts for email and password.
        Returns:
        adminID if succesfully logged in,-1 if unsuccesful.

      • createAdmin

        public int createAdmin()
        Creates new Admin Generates new adminID and checks if email is already in use. If email is not in used, new Admin will be written to CSV using AdminSerializer.
        Returns:
        1 if succesfully created, 0 if unsuccessful.

      • printAdminList

        public void printAdminList()
        Prints list of adminID,name and email for all Admins. Uses AdminSerializer

      • updateAdminPassword

        public void updateAdminPassword()
        Changes hashed password of existing Admin in database. Uses AdminSerializer.

      • deleteAdmin

        public void deleteAdmin(int accountHolderID)
        Deletes Admin with target adminID and name. Uses AdminSerializer. Currently logged in Admin cannot delete own account.
        Parameters:
        accountHolderID - This AdminManager's adminID.
